CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(PricebookEntry.Product2.Family) = "SALESPAD_SUBSCRIPTION" || TEXT(PricebookEntry.Product2.Family) = "DESKTOP_SUBSCRIPTION" || TEXT(PricebookEntry.Product2.Family) = "INTELLIGENCE", (UnitPrice /365)* Quote.Contract_Terms__c , UnitPrice )
CustomField.label: Prorated Sales Price(Subscription)
